skillTree.localised_description: Despite almost drowning in the encounter, felling a mighty Flame-Drake taught Felix how to pierce even the mightiest of hides.
Years of adventure and the many dangers faced along the way have made Felix fast on his feet and hard to pin down.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Seemingly endless drills – and more importantly, numerous battles – has accustomed Felix to deadly use of his Rune Sword Karaghul, which he wields with ever-burgeoning skill.
Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for all buildings (minimum of 1 turn)
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Two blades are infinitely better than one - twice the attack, double the number of fell lives unceremoniously ended.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: You've either got it or you haven't, and Felix is capable of dazzling anyone and everyone.
Remembering Kirsten's death at Manfred's hands stirs a lethal ferocity deep within Felix Jaeger.
Being as he is the companion of a Dwarf Slayer, Felix often finds himself having to adopt more diplomatic role, using his natural charisma to venture where he wishes without angering the locals.

effects.description: Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing
Diplomatic relations: +20 with men and Dwarfs
Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing
Diplomatic relations: +50 with men and Dwarfs

skillTree.localised_description: His prior work as a doorman has given Felix a keen sense of when an unwanted guest has arrived.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Guided by either a sense of honour or duty from his oath, the Rememberer must be present until the last moment of his companion's murderous life.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Despite only ever really wanting a quiet life, Felix ended up swearing a blood-oath to Gotrek, becoming his companion on the Slayer's quest to find his own, personal glorious doom.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

Campaign movement range: +25%
	(When this Hero is not embedded)
Melee Attack: +5 when in an army with Gotrek

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
